title: BRIEF-India's Yes Bank Says Its Outstanding Exposure To Housing Finance Co In News Is 'Totally Secured'
text:
BRIEF-India's Yes Bank Says Its Outstanding Exposure To Housing Finance Co In News Is 'Totally Secured'

Stock Markets 44 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 15:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Yes Bank Says Its Outstanding Exposure To Housing Finance Co In News Is 'Totally Secured' Sept 30 (Reuters) - Yes Bank Ltd : * SAYS ITS OUTSTANDING EXPOSURE TO THE HOUSING FINANCE COMPANY WHICH IS IN THE NEWS IS 'TOTALLY SECURED' * SAYS OVER LAST SIX MONTHS, EXPOSURE TO HOUSING FINANCE COMPANY WHICH IS IN THE NEWS ON MONDAY HAS FALLEN 30% Further company coverage: YESB.NS

BRIEF-India's Yes Bank Says Its Outstanding Exposure To Housing Finance Co In News Is 'Totally Secured'
